dataset.title: Bacterial Genomes from soil in Mixed Grass Prairie at Kessler Farm Field Laboratory, Oklahoma

abstract.para: Soil samples were obtained in November, 2005 from six sites at Kessler Farm Field Laboratory. Genomic information from those samples is included in this package.

intellectualRights.para: Users need to contact the owner of the data set for usage permission.

section.title: Soil Bacterial sampling
section.para: Six sites across Kessler Farm Field Laboratory, corresponding with the Piconet sampling locations, were sampled prior to the establishment of the Piconet weather stations. Soil was dug from 5 locations and bulked and then sampled for bacterial genomes.

methodStep.instrumentation: Standard genomic procedures and equipment were used

dataTable.entityDescription: multiple soil bacterial sequences from the Piconet sites at Kessler Farm Field Laboratory, OK
